item.title: Multiple Accounts
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:18, topic:339758”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=436134.msg3204257#msg3204257 date=1273630858]

Newbies often use multiple accounts as wingmen, which is one of the main reasons for not allowing you to have more than one account.
Most of the moderators would have experienced it by now if they’ve ever checked a topic in the downloads section on moparscape, for example. Account A posts their server for download, and then logs in on accounts B, C and D to post positive feedback. :rolleyes:

BAsh, you actually informed me of the situation ages ago as I recall (or it came up somewhere), so you were always fine. Others in the same boat as you, by rights, should have also told someone. I doubt anyone will kick up a shit about it now though, because I don’t think any of you have done what I so aptly described above. It’s the ones that ban evade that we go after.

im ban evading !
[/quote]please ban this ban evader already[/quote]

writeLog("lawl", "Banned");

by: Rixxx the

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Accounts
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

As Frell said, as long as you are not ban evade or breaking rules then you should be allowed to create as many accounts as you want, what other benefit than to hide their other identity is apparent with two accounts? Also it doesn’t matter if we don’t know that the same person is using two accounts, It’s the internet, anonymity exists, deal with it.

Read full topic

lol yeah but i actually do have two accounts…changed the password on the old one while it had a hotmail address, never got the confirmation email, so ive been using this one since. ban me?

Wait, that’s what I meant.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Accounts
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:339758”][quote=Tico]
Thread closed. If you guys want to discuss the multiple accounts rule, feel free to post a topic about it.
[/quote]

To continue on with the point of this topic, IMO i don’t see a real problem with multiple accounts as long as you aren’t
A: Ban evading
B: Using both accounts to actively post
C: Using accounts to break forum rules deliberately.

But that does question the whole point of having another account, i don’t see how you can forget your username and password.[/quote]
i have multiple accounts, and i am ban evading

Read full topic

Thread closed. If you guys want to discuss the multiple accounts rule, feel free to post a topic about it.

To continue on with the point of this topic, IMO i don’t see a real problem with multiple accounts as long as you aren’t
